info.name: Bitchute - Unclutter
info.description:
-Removes a lot of clutter from Bitchute, removes Disqus.
-Recolors watch count, like count, dislike count + various other things.
-Recolors search result page for dark style
-Recolors video upload page
-Adjusts player size based on browser width.
-Makes video statistics-bar, video release date and tag-bar invisible on half browser width, visible on hover.
-Colors social media link icons
info.additionalInfo:
I'm using night mode and style 163162 (makes top bar sleeker)

Update 1: 
-Recolored search result page to go with night mode
-Made video statistics-bar, video release date and tag-bar invisible on half browser width, visible on hover

Update 2:
-Recolored video upload page
-Bug fixes

Update 3:
-Made PLAYING NEXT and RECENT VIDEOS visible again on video watch page
-Recolored PLAYING NEXT and RECENT VIDEOS heading background and text
-Recolored PLAYING NEXT on/off slider backgrounds
-Added coloring to social media link icons
-Cleaned CSS a bit
